name: Ali Khan Jalbani
message: Kaash Unkon Samne Baith Kar Sun Paata Lkn Kambkhat Unki Wafat Ka Baad Paida Huwa
tribute:
Today, the world remembers the day it lost a voice that could make the heavens weep.
Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan was not just a singer—he was a river of devotion,
flowing through qawwali, carrying centuries of love, pain, and longing.

His voice could lift a broken soul,
turn silence into prayer,
and make even the stars lean closer to listen.

Though you left this world, Ustad,
your notes still breathe in every gathering,
your passion still burns in every heart that believes in the power of song.

May your soul forever rest in the music of the Divine,
for you taught us that music is not just to be heard—
it is to be felt,
deep in the place where we meet God.
